titles.title: Hometown Artists Act of 2011
To give priority to local and State artists when selecting appropriate artwork for Federal buildings.

bill.summary: 9/14/2011--Introduced. Hometown Artists Act of 2011 - Requires the Administrator of the General Services Administration (GSA) to give priority to state and local artists when selecting artwork for federal buildings, except for buildings located in the District of Columbia.
